overview: Life can throw changes at each and every single one of us, especially when we enter into the middle parts of our lives. A middle aged father and husband is stuck in an unhappy marriage with increasingly bitter wife. Their only bond is beautiful blonde daughter, who has invited her longtime friend to stay with them for a summer visit. Fresh from an afternoon tryst with his young secretary, the husband comes home to find that their daughter's friend has grown into a beautiful, sexy young woman. When he discovers she and their daughter secretly engaging in lesbian sex one night, his lust for his daughter's young friend becomes unbearable. Will the older man risk everything to satisfy his desire for the beautiful girl?
title: A Father's Lust
